item.title: Tech Interviews in China, circa 2022
item.description: I recently moved to China with my family and went through the process of looking for a new job in an unfamiliar and highly competitive market. I invested a significant amount of effort and time into the interviews, which made for an interesting experience. In this post, I’ll write about how I prepared for the interviews, the experience itself, and some thoughts around the process. Quirks of Tech Interviews in China Interview Format and Content Tech interviews in China have a lot in common with their US counterparts, but also many quirks.
